caption.title: Statistical analysis of element segregation in layered-LNMO.
caption.p: Frequency histogram of as-fabricated layered-LNMO ( a) Li, ( b) Ni, ( c) Mn and ( d) O with corresponding Pearson coefficients ( Î¼) compared with frequency histogram of cycled layered-LNMO ( e) Li, ( f) Ni ( g) Mn, ( h) O indicating a high degree of non-uniformity in distribution of Li, Ni, Mn and O in both as-fabricated and cycled Li 1.2Ni 0.2Mn 0.6O 2.
